title: High Ping on NBN - Unplayable 200ms+ with 1200ms spikes
body:
How can i fix this, we're on the 12Mbps deal with tpg (We're not rich) i am unable to play league because my ping will sit at 20-30 for 2 minutes and then unstable up to and beyond the 1200ms mark

Edit: Hextech repair tool is telling me i only have min 17ms to max 21ms, which is total shit, since i am on a base ping of 40 at the best of times

replies.body: the funny thing is Riot think their server do not have problem, i got the same, ping is only 9ms, but just when i play, i lose the data,can not play,lol .i use the TPG NBN,$99.99 one month, when i play other games, do not have this problem

The server and your connection to it are not the same. Usually this kind of issues lies somewhere *between* you and Riot, not *at* the Riot servers. Far more often than not, it's the ISP or the area that is the problem, not anything Riot has any power over.

Hi

There are plenty of ways that packets can go missing to/from Riot's servers.  See [What happens when I press Q?](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LFNc04Xs0aw&feature=youtu.be) for some info there..

First up - that kind of ping (especially ping instability, where it isn't at a constant level) can indicate any number of potential causes.  Here are a few to look into:
* Home wifi interference
* Overloaded / overheating modem or router
* Family / Flatmates taking up all of your bandwidth (congestion at home)
* Congestion in your ISP (too many customers sharing too little bandwidth)

If you haven't checked into it, try going through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article for a bit more info.

Cheers!
Mindstar
